To start viewing messages, select the forum that you want to visit from the selection below. + Reply to Thread Page 1 of 2 1 2 Last Jump to page: Results 1 to 10 of 18 Thread: Victorias secret reward

12-02-2008, 07:19 PM #1 raven716 View Profile View Forum Posts View Blog Entries View Articles Registered User Join Date Apr 2006 Location PA Posts 2 Victorias secret reward
Does anyone know if you can check what your Victorias secret reward card is worth without having to go to the store? Reply With Quote 12-02-2008, 07:34 PM #2 NWVinTexas View Profile View Forum Posts View Blog Entries View Articles Registered User Join Date Dec 2004 Location South Texas Posts 1,047 That's what I'm wondering too! I thought about going online, entering it to see how much it would take off my total and then removing it to try the other two that I have so that I can redeem my biggest discount whatever that may be. If anyone has an easier way, I'd love to know how! Reply With Quote 12-02-2008, 07:59 PM #3 natsmom View Profile View Forum Posts View Blog Entries View Articles Registered User Join Date Oct 2008 Posts 5 call customer service or the store Reply With Quote 12-02-2008, 09:15 PM #4 NotMyFault View Profile View Forum Posts View Blog Entries View Articles 1/2007 Join Date Oct 2005 Posts 213 I placed an order using this card last night. It didn't even tell me what it was worth after I checked out! I received my receipt in my email and the total was for $10 less than the invoice was so I figure it was a $10 reward. Reply With Quote 12-02-2008, 10:14 PM #5 finstotheleft View Profile View Forum Posts View Blog Entries View Articles Registered User Join Date Apr 2008 Posts 17 Call the number on the back of the card A friend of mine called the number on the back of the card and they told her the value. Hers was $100. Yipee Reply With Quote 12-02-2008, 10:20 PM #6 sibyl View Profile View Forum Posts View Blog Entries View Articles Registered User Join Date Nov 2005 Location st.francis, wi Posts 682 there should be #s on the back try calling and asking how much Reply With Quote 12-03-2008, 07:12 AM #7 twinmom65 View Profile View Forum Posts View Blog Entries Visit Homepage View Articles Registered User Join Date Mar 2001 Location Central NJ Posts 1,713 I tried doing it online but it does not tell you until you actually place your order. Then it said $10 applied to your gift card balance to cc. Reply With Quote 12-03-2008, 09:44 AM #8 casper31973 View Profile View Forum Posts View Blog Entries View Articles Registered User Join Date May 2005 Location NY Posts 348 I have 4 cards and they are all $10 I would assume its worth $10 and if its more you will be in for a surprise....but I doubt its worth more. Reply With Quote 12-03-2008, 11:09 AM #9 kelbel View Profile View Forum Posts View Blog Entries View Articles Registered User Join Date Jun 2007 Posts 100 How do you get one? Do I need to sign up for credit card or something? Reply With Quote 12-03-2008, 11:38 AM #10 gaelicdancer84 View Profile View Forum Posts View Blog Entries View Articles Registered User Join Date Apr 2008 Posts 116 any one know if you can combine? i have 3 can u use all 3 in the same order? Reply With Quote
